description: This file sets up and runs an accuracy evaluation for an AI agent using specific tools and models, then asserts the result meets a threshold.

classes.name: AccuracyEval
classes.description: Class responsible for evaluating the accuracy of an agent's performance.

classes.name: AccuracyResult
classes.description: Class representing the result of an accuracy evaluation.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Class representing an AI agent with a model and tools.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Class representing an OpenAI chat model.

classes.name: CalculatorTools
classes.description: Class providing calculator tools, such as factorial.

methods.name: run
methods.description: Method to execute the accuracy evaluation and return the result.
